title: mareya bEDa
sahitya:
mareya bEDa manave nInu hariya caraNava 
aruNa kiraNa caraNa sharaNa pAdaka pAvana


caraNam 1    sAdhu sajjana sangava mADi vEda shAsravanOdu nI 
mOdadindali vEdagamyana pAdapankaja dhyAnisO
    caraNam 2    satiyu sutaru gatiyu endu matiyu keTTu tiruga bEDa 
matiyu keTTu hOda mEle satiyu sutaru baruvarEnu
    caraNam 3    mAnuSa janma durlabhavidu mAdhavana krpeyali bandide 
hIna janara kUDi nInu hAni mADi koLalu bEDa
    caraNam 4    bandha pagaDeyADi nInu vyartta kAla kaLeyabEDa 
antakana dUtarige lEsha karuNa villavayya
    caraNam 5    yAga yagjna mADalEke yOgi yatiyu AkalEke 
nAga shayana nArada vandyana kUgi bhajane mADu bEga
    caraNam 6    gOpurada kombeyante grAma gruha rakSipenendu 
tApa paDuta hagalu iruLu tAmasa janara kUDade
    caraNam 7    hariya smaraNe mAtradinda ghOra duritavella nAsha 
varada purandara viTTalanna nirata bhajane mADu bEga
